pages.text: A Vault Potion is the $(l)only$() potion type that $(l)doesn't$() anger $(l)Velara$(), Vault God of Health.$(br2)When consuming $(l)any other$() type of potion, Velara will cast their $(l)anger$() upon you by applying the $(l)Velara's Wrath$() $(l:the_vault/modifiers)Vault modifier$() to the Vault.$(br2)This reduces $(l)Healing Efficiency$() by $(l)20%$() and can reduce up to a total of $(l)80% maximum$().
